attributes.action: give more funding to the Army Cadet Force Nationwide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a memeber of the Army Cadet Force in the UK, i know that more funding is needed..therefore i have created this petition to try and get the current PM to give more funding to the youth organisation. this in-turn could help get young people off the streets, as more funding means more fun things to do, meaning more people will enjoy parading once or twice a week, and on regular weekend and annual camps
